Message:
Hearing her story,
I came to understand the factors
that led to her decision.

But, that still doesn’t
pardon her from the sin
of murdering my sister.

If she was capable of making
the choice to spare me,
then surely...

If she’d just been
rotten down to her core,
I wouldn’t have had to
suffer this much.

But, my resolve won’t change.
I will kill her. Just, not now.

Once she finds something
irreplaceable to her,
and all her days feel
precious because of it...

Until that time comes,
I’ll make sure she doesn’t die.
But, now is still too soon
to seek my vengeance.

That is the revenge
my sister and I will give you.

A curse so gentle,
it brings one to tears...
